description.narrative: Strategic partnerships are forged and strengthened to positively influence social beliefs of families, care takers and communities related to child care and gender perceptions, which contributes to Cross-Sectoral Communication For Development. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Social policies, programmes, public opinion and social norms are strengthened to promote and advance child rights

mailing-address.narrative: 87 Misr Helwan Agricultural Road Maadi Cairo

sector.narrative: Advocacy and partnership-building for social behaviour change
Capacity and skills development for social behaviour change
Technical assistance - Cross-sectoral communication for development

title.narrative: Description of UNICEF programming approach framework at the country level with Common Country Assessments (CCAs) providing the equivalence of pre project appraisals

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Strategic partnerships are forged and strengthened to positively influence social beliefs of families, care takers and communitiesrelated to child care and gender perceptions

description.narrative: An estimated 500,000 people sensitized through capacity building and awareness raising sessions in support of the national efforts to reduce violence against children. Over 1,200 university students have increased capacity to disseminate ‘Facts of Life' messages to strengthen healthy nutrition behaviors, through the University Pioneers Network established in 2017. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:10/01/2018
